timeline.message:
DHFPROD-4663: Added test for sourceQueryIsScript

The test verifies that content.uri can be converted into an array. Also converted flow-runner-test into a normal test project so we don't need special code for it any longer.

DHFPROD-4663: Added test for sourceQueryIsScript

The test verifies that content.uri can be converted into an array. Also converted flow-runner-test into a normal test project so we don't need special code for it any longer.

timeline.bodyText: Should there be a "sourceQuery" option here with a source query ?
timeline.author: srinathgit

replies.bodyText: It's added by the test - the test uses different values for sourceQuery. Which ends up verifying that sourceQuery can be specified via runtime options too.
replies.author: rjrudin
